body: I remember this anime when i first watch this and mu favorite part is kissing scenes between the mc and her FMC's 🤣
why there was only one doujin wtf this was the best anime ever been made in the year of 2012 but still only got one doujin what a poor mind they are
1 doujin that's worth 10 ones. Great job my fella.

Ahh one of my favorite mangas and anime, I believe it was one of few anime's/mangas that brought into the otaku life, *sigh* if only the more newer generation of otakus found this hidden gem it would surely become more successful
What the fuck only 1 doujin?  This campione is SAIKU!!!!!  I HOPE THEY WILL MAKE SOME

Campione! is one of my personal favorites! But it's not fun that there is only one doujin! I am hoping that this artist and many others may consider looking into making more for the series, specifically for Athena!!!

As a fan who has read every single one of the light novels and watched the anime too many times to count I can say without a doubt that you did this perfectly. The personalities were perfect and the dialog was very much what I'd expect if such a thing actually took place. (which it probably did after volume 21)
Campione was made for a harem, and it did it so right <3
